title: Michigan Firm Recalls Ground Beef Products Due o Possible E. Coli O157:NM Contamination
summary: Editor's Note: The pathogen that prompted FSIS to initiate this recall was E. coli O157:NM, not E. coli O157:H7 as previously reported. WASHINGTON, Aug. 9, 2011 - McNees Meats and Wholesale LLC., a North Branch, Mich., establishment is recalling approximately 360 pounds of ground beef...

establishment.name: McNees Meats and Wholesale LLC
establishment.address:
6267 Old State Road 
  North Branch, MI 48461

impacted_products: 36 - 10 lb. Bags of "McNees Ground Beef Bulk."
